title: The ownership of such structures and other appurtenant users shall vest, by provision in a deed of conveyance, in all the owners on account of whose cumulative holdings the LOS is required to be kept as LOS, in the layout or sub-division/amalgamation/plot of the land
clause_text: The ownership of such structures and other appurtenant users shall vest, by provision in a deed of conveyance, in all the owners on account of whose cumulative holdings the LOS is required to be kept as LOS, in the layout or sub-division/amalgamation/plot of the land.
